```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy import special
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 
```

```py
>>> p = special.gegenbauer(3, 0.5, monic=False)
>>> p
poly1d([ 2.5,  0\. , -1.5,  0\. ])
>>> p(1)
1.0 
```

```py
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> ax.plot(x, y)
>>> ax.set_title("Gegenbauer (ultraspherical) polynomial of degree 3")
>>> ax.set_xlabel("x")
>>> ax.set_ylabel("G_3(x)")
>>> plt.show() 
```
